meals.title: Fried Chicken
meals.description:
1.Preheat pan, pour some oil, add chopped onion
2.After while add some water and sliced carrots and paprika
3.Throw some diced chicken
4.Prepare rice however you want
5.Mix rice with everything in pan GG
